## WorkspaceSvg.centerOnBlock() method

Scroll the workspace to center on the given block. If the block has other blocks stacked below it, the workspace will be centered on the stack.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
centerOnBlock(id: string | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string \| null | ID of block center on. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
